name: TRIangle (itch) (Undersans886)
description:
TRIangle is a game based off of another game called gorescript.  Fight your way through waves of enemies and try to survive for as long as possible.

To play this game online (if you don't have windows) click here:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/465640332/

To view the game's OST click here:

https://www.bandlab.com/underss/albums/5ef247bd-4441-eb11-a607-0004ffd347fb

! Controls !WASD to moveMouse to shootNumber keys to switch weapon (1, 2, 3, 4)
